nodes.text: What are you chump, blind? This is a slave pen. You want to know more, talk to Vortis.
Everybody's heard of Vault 13. When I was a kid, me and my friends used to go prospecting for it. Supposed to be east of here, so we searched everything but never did find it.
That'd be Vortis, the old guy.
Those bastards killed my brother and then said it was for the good of the people!  I want them dead. If you can help, talk to Vortis.
I know more than old Vortis gives me credit for, you know.
It that so? Well, I'm sending you back in a body bag.
Go on, get out of here. I've already got enough idiot guards!
What the hell are you? Some kind of burglar?
Well, I've done a lot more than most people suspect. Like this job, though. It's nice and cushy.

GECK, eh? Back when I was studying Vault tech, I read about those. Supposedly every vault got one and it was supposed to be the first thing used once a vault got opened. They say that's how Shady Sands got its start - from a GECK. That help at all?
The Enclave.... You know, there's a doc in town, goes by the name of Henry. One night when he was drunk he started going on about some guys he called the Enclave.

Me, I'm always on the lookout - problem is, nobody ever wants to hire a slaver anymore. Vortis, my boss, has got something hush-hush. And in town the ranchers at the Stockmen's Association are always hiring plus Dorothy can always use a hand at the powerplant if you got skills. Word is even President Tandi's looking for a specialist.
You cut their... you knows... off for me, okay?

links.text: Forget it. I don't want to take up your time.
I'm looking for work. Know anybody who's hiring?
Ever hear of a GECK?
Know anything about an outfit called the Enclave?
I'm looking for Vault 13. Ever hear of it?
What's the deal with these Rangers I hear about?
I'm sure you tried hard. I'd like to ask some more questions, since you know so much.
I'm sure you tried hard. I'd like to ask some more questions, since you know so much.
I'm sure you tried hard. I'd like to ask some more questions, since you know so much.
Well, I got to go.
I'm sure you tried hard. I'd like to ask some more questions, since you know so much.
Thanks. Say, you seem like a bright guy. I'll bet you can help me out with a few questions
The old guy, eh? Okay.

Sounds like a good idea to me.
Right. Think I'll do that right now.
Vortis, eh? You're a fountain of wisdom. What else do you know?

That's all I need bother you with. Thanks.

Brother slaver, I've got a few questions.
Kurg?

What is this place?
The Rangers sent me.
I'm looking for the owner.
Sorry, wrong guy.

Well, I'll get right on these leads.

I'll take care of them, don't worry.
No problem. There's some other stuff I'd like to know, though.
